channel.title: Fasting
channel.description:
I doubt lot's of people fast here but dose anyone fast?
[b]Fasting Definition From Wikipedia[/b] -[code]Fasting is primarily the act of willingly abstaining from some or all food, drink, or both, for a period of time. An absolute fast is normally defined as abstinence from all food and liquid for a defined period, usually a single day (24 hours), or several days. Juice fasting involves abstaining from food while deriving nutritional intake through freshly-juiced vegetables and fruits such that the body may detoxify. Other fasts may be only partially restrictive, limiting particular foods or substance. The fast may also be intermittent in nature. Fasting practices may preclude sexual intercourse and other activities as well as food.[/code] [b]Some Benefits -[/b] [code]Antiaging effects Better attitude Better resistance to disease Better sleep Change of habits Clearer planning Clearer skin Creativity Diet changes Drug detoxification Improved senses (vision, hearing, taste) Inspiration More clarity (mentally and emotionally) More energy More relaxation New ideas Purification Reduction of allergies Rejuvenation Rest for digestive organs Revitalization Right use of will Spiritual awareness Weight loss [/code] [b]Please answer -[/b] 1. Do you fast for religious reasons or for health or spiritual reasons 2. How do you fast do you abstain from all food and drink(except water) or juice fasting or ...

item.title: Fasting
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:31, topic:435642”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=538362.msg3939512#msg3939512 date=1331305896]

I fast porn.

This, and cake, tend to eat a lot of cake as my mum constantly bakes, endless supply of cake in my house -_-
[/quote]time to go to your house :o

my mates from school actually used to do that at lunch time, my school was 5 minutes walk from my house and literally there’d be like 8 people in my kitchen just eating cake -.-[/quote]I noticed you added that “anti-loveandpower ward”

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“Classic_, post:42, topic:435642”][quote author=ytuio9` link=topic=538362.msg3939398#msg3939398 date=1331296554]
Muslims have to fast for 30 or 31 days from sunrise too sunset. I know a lot of people that have included this in their daily life, they fast once a week. I would do it on my weekend but unfortunately I have tennis training on both days so that is not an option.
[/quote]
lol terrorist that plays tennis inbound[/quote]

Gratz on that completely ignorant statement.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:33, topic:435642”]I heard that they get up at a ridiculous time… like 4am and just eat loads of shit. [size=3pt](curry prob)[/size]

Some even used to make it as a excuse to not do P.E.[/quote]
Yeah, we gut up right before sunset to eat. Afaik, traditionally we eat “ful” in Egypt. It’s pretty tasty Apparently it takes time to be digested so eating it makes you less hungry… or something.

item.title: Fasting
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Me being muslim, I have fasted quite a few times before. Theres no benefits apart from a fat breakfast and you enjoying your meal at the end of the day. Its a pain in the ass so I don’t do it anymore. If you were meaning long term I used to not eat for days at a time (one of the many reasons I’m skinny now lol) the only benefits were weight loss and a less urge to eat but the bad sides outway the possible positives… Extreme not eating never done before.

Read full topic
